function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variability in testing techniques and accuracy of results","Impact":"Misdiagnosis and delayed treatment","Mitigation":"Standardization of testing protocols and continuous improvement of testing accuracy","Technologies":"Standardized PCR testing, advanced molecular diagnostic tests","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals, general population","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Rapid increase in demand for testing kits","Impact":"Shortage of testing kits, inability to test voluminous population","Mitigation":"Scaling up production, diversifying testing techniques, international cooperation in supply chain management","Technologies":"Automated testing equipment, rapid testing kits","People":"Healthcare providers, patients, general population","Owner":"Manufacturers, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Use of AI and ML in predicting infection spreading rates and diagnosing diseases","Impact":"Reliance on technology for critical decision-making, potential errors in prediction","Mitigation":"Validation of AI and ML models, continuous monitoring and feedback","Technologies":"AI, ML models for infection prediction and diagnosis","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients, general population","Owner":"AI/ML technology developers, healthcare organizations"}]}
